rows.title: How to add JTable in JPanel with null layout?

97:
<p>When a component have a "null" layout, you have to manage the layout by yourself, that means you have to calculate the dimensions and locations for the children of the component to decide where they are drawn. Quite tedious unless it is absolutely necessary.</p>

<p>If you really want that fine-grained control, maybe try GridBagLayout first before going mudding with the UI arrangement.</p>
